item.title: Iran Lures Transgender Foreigners for Surgery but Forces Operations on Locals

item.title: What Courts Have Said in Challenges to Trump’s National Guard Deployments
item.description: Federal courts across the country have heard legal challenges to the mobilization of troops in Los Angeles, Washington, Portland, Ore., and Chicago. H...

item.title: Gaza Cease-Fire Begins, Israel Says, as Thousands Return to the North
item.description: The Israeli military’s announcement of a pause in fighting brought a mass movement of people heading home to Gaza City and its surroundings.

item.title: Aid Groups Prepare to Provide Quick Relief to Gaza Under Cease-Fire
item.description: The new Israel-Hamas deal contains provisions to increase aid to Gaza, and for the reopening of a border crossing from Egypt.
